text: I priblizitsya Den' prednaznachennyy - neminuyemyy Sudnyy den', - v kotoryy glaza nevernykh zakatyatsya v uzhase, i oni zakrichat: "O, gore nam, my strashimsya gibeli! My byli v nebrezhenii ob etom Dne. My byli nevernymi greshnikami, nespravedlivymi k sebe v svoyom nastoychivom otritsanii istinnoy very
